name: HorribleSubs - Dark
description:
Complete Dark Theme for HorribleSubs website.

It even helps you see which shows you have already checked out by coloring them.

If you have any requests or feedback then post it below.
additional_info:
Update 1:
Background color can be darker or same as the background color of the content.

Version 1:
Hovered links are colored blue.
Links to shows and articles you have visited are colored orange.
